title: Leave your iPhone at home: Runkeeper’s new Apple Watch app tracks your stats alone
text:
Leave your iPhone at home: Runkeeper’s new Apple Watch app tracks your stats alone 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
The Apple Watch's latest update allows for native apps, which means that some apps will work on the watch without your phone's help. RunKeep...
